content:
73 
 
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY   UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  
     (xxiv) UYO accepts HND lower credit ND upper 
credit in relevant programmes.  
(xxv) WELLSPRING accepts ND, NCE, IJMB, NABTEB 
‘A’ level, HND passes at credit/lower credit 
level in relevant subjects/programmes in 
addition to the ‘O’ level requirements.  
  
UTME  
(i) AAUA requires two (2) other ‘O’ level credit 
passes in any of Commerce, Accounting, 
Geography and Government.  
(ii) ABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
including  English  Language, 
 Economic, Mathematics and any other two 
(2) subjects.  
(iii) ABUJA and COOU accept Commerce In lieu of 
Economics  
(iv) AUN same as in Finance.  
(v) EBSU,  RSUST  and  PHC  -Same 
 as  in  
Accountancy.  
(vi) FED-DUTSINMA accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes  to  include:  English  Language,  
Mathematics, Economics/ Entrepreneurship/ 
Commerce/ Marketing and any two (2) 
subjects.  
(vii) LAGOS requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics, 
and any two (2) of Financial Accounting, 
Government, Geography, CRS/IS, Business 
Management.  
(viii) PHC does not accept commercial subjects.  
(ix) PLASU – Same as in Accounting.  
(x) PLASU accepts Commerce or Principles of 
Accounts In lieu of Economics.  
(xi) UNIZIK accepts a pass in Economics
